channel.title: 4 ERRORS : please help!
channel.description:
Ok, I tried to add the "black knight titan boss" or something...
Then, when I saved and compiled, I got this:
[code]NPCHandler.java:390: illegal start of expression if(npcs[i].npcType == 1645 || ^ NPCHandler.java:389: not a statement npcs[i].npcType == 1913 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || ^ NPCHandler.java:402: illegal start of expression npcs[i].npcType == 221|| if(npcs[i].npcType == 1645 || npcs[i].npcType == 509 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || npcs[i].npcType == 1246) ^ NPCHandler.java:402: not a statement npcs[i].npcType == 221|| if(npcs[i].npcType == 1645 || npcs[i].npcType == 509 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || npcs[i].npcType == 1246) ^ 4 errors Files Compiled Successfully![/code]
PLEASE help, I wanna keep on my server :(

item.title: 4 ERRORS : please help!
item.dc:creator: @Faiter_1 Faiter 1
item.description:
@Faiter_1 wrote:

Which bracklet?

EDIT: BTW, “else if” didnt work… :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 29, 2008, 02:00:18 PM[/size][hr]I still need help!! please!
